plot: Brandon Lidge is a suspected drug dealer who takes control of a local home in order to gain the trust of one officer whom is believed to have murdered Brandon's brother.
title: The Descending
plot_es: Brandon Lidge is a suspected drug dealer who takes control of a local home in order to gain the trust of one officer whom is believed to have murdered Brandon's brother.
plot_en: Brandon Lidge is a suspected drug dealer who takes control of a local home in order to gain the trust of one officer whom is believed to have murdered Brandon's brother.
